author: Simon Difford
description: Slightly on the bitter side of bittersweet with gentian, jammy apricot and lemon juice over a tequila base.
name: Sunny Disposition cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
